heroSection.description: This image showcases the company's expertise in underground utility work, depicting a trench dug in a residential yard with piping and a water meter installed. The yellow caution tape highlights the professionalism and safety measures taken during the project.
heroSection.callToAction: Trust our experienced team to handle all your underground utility needs with precision and care.

heroSection.description: This image displays the company's skill in bathroom remodeling and plumbing installations. It features a newly installed toilet and sink in a modern bathroom setting with dark walls and wood-like flooring.
heroSection.callToAction: Upgrade your bathroom with our top-notch plumbing and remodeling services for a luxurious and functional space.

heroSection.description: This powerful image showcases the company's expertise in gas line installations and maintenance. It depicts a sleek, modern gas furnace unit with copper piping neatly installed, demonstrating their attention to detail and commitment to safety.
heroSection.callToAction: Ensure your home's gas appliances are running safely and efficiently with our professional gas line services.

aboutUsSection.description: This image displays the company's proficiency in water heater installations and replacements. It features two modern, energy-efficient water heater units installed in a well-organized mechanical room.
aboutUsSection.reasonForAboutUs: This image effectively demonstrates the company's capabilities in handling complex plumbing installations, showcasing their commitment to quality workmanship and adherence to industry standards.

aboutUsSection.description: This image highlights the company's expertise in plumbing system design and installation. It shows a neatly organized manifold system with multiple valves and piping, indicating their ability to handle intricate plumbing projects.
aboutUsSection.reasonForAboutUs: This image effectively conveys the company's attention to detail and their commitment to delivering well-planned and organized plumbing solutions, which is essential for building trust with potential clients.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Gloria Banes
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Nick and Nelson blew us away with their promptness, professionalism, knowledge and quality of work!  Will never use another service.  More than pleased!!!!  We highly recommend them.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Sloan Plumbing and Drain Service

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kaitlin Echols
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: 10/10 recommend, super friendly, arrived on time. got the job done in a timely manner and haven’t had any complications since before they fixed my problems. Completely earned my trust and service, will be using them from here on out.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Sloan Plumbing and Drain Service

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tristan Stephens
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Nick was great! Very consistent if he said he was going to be there at a certain time  he was there. His work was great and he cleaned any mess that was made. Very thankful for his service.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Sloan Plumbing and Drain Service

aboutUs: At Sloan Plumbing and Drain Service, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbers dedicated to providing top-notch services to homeowners and businesses throughout Alabama. Our expertise lies in tackling even the most complex plumbing and drain issues with precision and efficiency. From routine maintenance to emergency repairs, we specialize in a wide range of services tailored to meet your unique needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing company committed to delivering exceptional service and lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for emergency plumbing situations, ensuring your issues are addressed promptly and effectively.
State-of-the-art equipment and techniques to diagnose and resolve even the most challenging plumbing and drain problems.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, so you know exactly what to expect before any work begins.
